subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Washington’s 34-point lead over Miami shrank to single digits Wednesday night, but the Wizards held on for a 114-97 victory at home as the Heat’s Greg Oden played in his first game in more than four years.
snippet: Washington’s 34-point lead over Miami shrank to single digits Wednesday night, but the Wizards held on for a 114-97 victory at home as the Heat’s Greg Oden played in his first game in more than four years.
